location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 35/48(1) 'Persian Gulf: opening of telegraph office in Qatar'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 31; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns discussions on the proposed opening of a telegraph office in Qatar.The file contains correspondence between: the Government of India; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; the Commonwealth Communications Council; the India Office; and Cable and Wireless Limited.
